alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 24 at 8:40AM MDT until March 25 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Highlands including I-40 through Clines Corners. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous crosswinds expected on southwest-to-northeast oriented roads.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
